price: Is one who is a believer like one who is an evildoer? They are not equal.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
